 2000-02912000-03-020,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by TRANSGAS LIMITED of its statutory power to acquire a right-of-way on LITTLE PINE INDIAN RESERVE No. 116 in Saskatchewan, for the purposes of a natural gas pipeline, and (b) granting them an easement for those purposes, in lieu thereof.
